title: NYC Type Club - first meeting Thursday March 9th
content:
Font fiends,

Announcing the first ever meeting of, what is destined to be, the most aggressively fanatic typography club in human history …held in a bar. The themed event for our premiere meeting is: Auto-convert your hand-drawn alphabets into usable fonts which will be posted for free on the net.

A free event.

RSVP and direct questions to:  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/imbrettjackson/106906250/?#comment72057594073576781](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329190332/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/imbrettjackson/106906250/#comment72057594073576781)

8PM at The Skinny (174 Orchard St. [1 block off Houston]) New York City

Apologies if you’ve already seen this cross posted at Typographi.ca….

Thanks,  
Brett
author: imbrettjackson
